column4: I have cedega, and for games that work, they work really well, but for those that dont, they dont work at all :P
Yeah well, some games are supported and some aren't. There's a list on the website.
then again, I play Civ 4 and Guild Wars really, and they work great :)
Nice. I hate guild wars, but I LOVE civ 4. Never really got into it, but it is a great game.
